comments.en:
requires IEEE-1284 cable.
"600dpi class" printer.
Printer may randomly leave PCL mode; fix: prepend the PJL command "^[%-12345X@PJL ENTER LANGUAGE=PCL" at the start of the job, where the square character is an escape character (0x1b). This, and other PJL option controls, are trivially implemented with PDQ; see the HOWTO.

Consumables/Refills: toner cart., US$25 every ~2K pages; drum, US$150 every ~20K page
